import React from 'react'; import '../../styles/elemon.css' const InfoCard = ({ elemon }) => { console.log(elemon) const rarity = ['B', 'A', 'S', 'SS', 'SSS'] const URI = 'https://app.elemon.io'; const bodyPart = [elemon.bodyPart1, elemon.bodyPart2, elemon.bodyPart3, elemon.bodyPart4, elemon.bodyPart5, elemon.bodyPart6]; return (

ID: {elemon.tokenId}

{Number(elemon.lasPrice) / 10000000000000000} BUSD

{/*

~0 USD

*/}
); }; export default InfoCard;
